original_command: \powershell.exe \pwsh.exe \cmd.exe Invoke-WebRequest iwr wget curl -ur -me -b POST \curl.exe --ur -d --data \wget.exe --post-data --post-file Get-Content GetBytes hostname ifconfig ipconfig net view netstat nltest qprocess sc query systeminfo tasklist ToBase64String whoami type > C:\
